items.sentence: Tom certainly made sure we all had a good time.
Tom claimed that he could run faster than Mary.
Tom convinced Mary to go along with the scheme.
Tom spends a majority of his time helping Mary.
Tom spent all day looking around antique shops.
Tom suffered from migraine headaches for years.
I did that all the time when I lived in Boston.
You should let Tom know that Mary will do that.
You should pay more attention to what Tom says.
Just let me know if you won\'t be here on time.
Tom\'s cat was waiting for him on the doorstep.
My father was already at home when I came back.
I don\'t know what we\'re going to do tomorrow.
I don\'t know what we\'re going to do with Tom.
I don\'t know when we\'re supposed to be there.
There\'s a possibility Tom will use my bicycle.
Most of the islands in this area are inhabited.
My assistant is a thirty-year-old Canadian man.
You should let Tom know that you want to drive.
You should seriously consider going to college.
